traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The roper can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The roper makes two Tentacle attacks, uses Reel, and makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 60 ft. Hit: The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of six tentacles, and it has the Poisoned condition until the grapple ends. The tentacle can be damaged, freeing a creature it has Grappled when destroyed (AC 20, HP 10, Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage). Damaging the tentacle deals no damage to the roper, and a destroyed tentacle regrows at the start of the roperâ€™s next turn.

reactions.name: Reel
reactions.description: The roper pulls each creature Grappled by it up to 30 feet straight toward it.
